channel.title: Server Creator Developement Thread
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i735.photobucket.com/albums/ww360/bloody4ftw/ServerCreatorGIF.gif[/img] [b][i][size=8pt]Graphics by Mod Skillz[/size][/i][/b]
[b][i]What does this do?[/i][/b]
[ul][li]The RSMedival Server Creator does what its named. Creates Servers for people who have almost no knolledge of programming.[/li][/ul]
[i][b]What will it be written in?[/b][/i]
[ul][li]C#[/li][/ul]
[i][b]What will it contain?[/b][/i]
[ul][li]AutoMatic Portfowarder + NO-IP Setup.[/li] [li]Some basic sources that will be in links. Upon click it will come with an installer to easily install it onto the Server Creator.[/li] [li]Easy to use coding feature.[/li] [li]A special compiler written for the user. Upon installation the user must select their JDK and JRE type so no hassles will be held.[/li] [li]Many help links including a custom made FAQ page.[/li] [li]A customized website creator. (The websites will be hosted off www.BraveHost.com) We will be making our own website formats.[/li] [li]JAR Maker with a custom way to make your own webclient and post it onto the website.[/li] [li]Help Tool Menu (This is the same format as almost any product.)[/li] [li]Very easy to use tutorials on coding servers.[/li] [li]RSMedival Doz Text Applet (A program written in C# that works the same way as Microsoft Office Word but with many more features.)[/li][/ul]
[i][b]How easy will it be to operate?[/b][/i]
[ul][li]The RSMedival Server Creator will be [u]EXTREMELY[/u] simple. A basic program yet efficant for new server creators.[/li][/ul]
[i][b]How is it performance wise?[/b][/i]
[ul][li]The actual product itself will only take up about 10-20% of CPU Usage.[/li] [li]The sources inside were created by RSMedival and are made for handling 100+ players with great stability.[/li][/ul]
[i][b]Who is in this project?[/b][/i] The project consists of the following:
[ul][li]Brawler [i]Source Creator and Head Programmer[/i][/li] [li]Linkey [i]Secondary Scriptist and Project Manager[/i][/li] [li]Younes [i]HTML Creation and Scripting[/i][/li] [li]Mod Skillz [i]Graphics (such as buttons)[/i][/li] [li]Lulz FTW Lulz [i]FAQ + Help Pages[/i][/li] [li]Bloody4Scape [i]Client Models[/i][/li][/ul]
[i][b]When will it be realeased?[/b][/i] We do not have a specific date, although check this page every week for more and more updates.
[i][b]How can I join the team?[/b][/i] Copy and paste the following and make an application.
[code][b]Name:[/b] [b]I would like to help on:[/b] [b]eMail/MSN:[/b] [b]Experience:[/b] [b]Other Information:[/b][/code]
[b][i]Example:[/i][/b]
[b]Name:[/b] Joe [b]I would like to help on:[/b] Compiler [b]eMail/MSN:[/b] joe@email.com [b]Experience:[/b] 2 years of coding [b]Other Information:[/b] I'd love to help out on the project!
[IMG]http://i735.photobucket.com/albums/ww360/bloody4ftw/Approval.png[/img]

item.title: Server Creator Developement Thread
item.dc:creator: @Trickery123 Trickery123
item.description:
@Trickery123 wrote:

That automatic No-Ip, would probably be the hardest, because there are some modems that can’t be hosted because there not listed, for example the the variety of the SurfBoard Modems aren’t enlisted last time I checked, and you would have to make something that would automatically identify the modem, unless that is you make them pick it out.

Other then that looks pretty good.
Hope this isn’t no hokes.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Creator Developement Thread
item.dc:creator: @linkey linkey
item.description:
@linkey wrote:

The AutoMated Portfowarding is very simple to add. We will have the user select what type of router they have, (We will only include popular ones like Linksys, Belkin, Gearnet) afterwards it will try many different Default Admin Passwords. After it finds the Default Admin Password for the users router it can portfoward it.

The NO-IP setup is not automated. It comes with a tutorial with links to go onto NO-IP. Since we find that users usually have no trouble using NO-IP we simply have a small tutorial web page that is being created by Younes right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Creator Developement Thread
item.dc:creator: @linkey linkey
item.description:
@linkey wrote:


[size=8pt]Graphics by Mod Skillz[/size]

What does this do?

[ul][li]The RSMedival Server Creator does what its named. Creates Servers for people who have almost no knolledge of programming.[/li][/ul]

What will it be written in?

[ul][li]C#[/li][/ul]

What will it contain?

[ul][li]AutoMatic Portfowarder + NO-IP Setup.[/li]
[li]Some basic sources that will be in links. Upon click it will come with an installer to easily install it onto the Server Creator.[/li]
[li]Easy to use coding feature.[/li]
[li]A special compiler written for the user. Upon installation the user must select their JDK and JRE type so no hassles will be held.[/li]
[li]Many help links including a custom made FAQ page.[/li]
[li]A customized website creator. (The websites will be hosted off www.BraveHost.com) We will be making our own website formats.[/li]
[li]JAR Maker with a custom way to make your own webclient and post it onto the website.[/li]
[li]Help Tool Menu (This is the same format as almost any product.)[/li]
[li]Very easy to use tutorials on coding servers.[/li]
[li]RSMedival Doz Text Applet (A program written in C# that works the same way as Microsoft Office Word but with many more features.)[/li][/ul]

How easy will it be to operate?

[ul][li]The RSMedival Server Creator will be EXTREMELY simple. A basic program yet efficant for new server creators.[/li][/ul]

How is it performance wise?

[ul][li]The actual product itself will only take up about 10-20% of CPU Usage.[/li]
[li]The sources inside were created by RSMedival and are made for handling 100+ players with great stability.[/li][/ul]

Who is in this project?
The project consists of the following:

[ul][li]Brawler Source Creator and Head Programmer[/li]
[li]Linkey Secondary Scriptist and Project Manager[/li]
[li]Younes HTML Creation and Scripting[/li]
[li]Mod Skillz Graphics (such as buttons)[/li]
[li]Lulz FTW Lulz FAQ + Help Pages[/li]
[li]Bloody4Scape Client Models[/li][/ul]

When will it be realeased?
We do not have a specific date, although check this page every week for more and more updates.

How can I join the team?
Copy and paste the following and make an application.

[b]Name:[/b] [b]I would like to help on:[/b] [b]eMail/MSN:[/b] [b]Experience:[/b] [b]Other Information:[/b]

Example:

Name: Joe
I would like to help on: Compiler
eMail/MSN: joe@email.com
Experience: 2 years of coding
Other Information: I’d love to help out on the project!

Approval.png1022×170

Read full topic
